messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Betrace. May I know your name, please?
Hi Fiona, how can I assist you today?
I have an issue with the payment for my Nespresso Coffee Machine. It's been a nightmare!
I'm sorry to hear that, Fiona. Could you please provide me with more details about the issue you're facing?
I was charged twice for the Nespresso Coffee Machine and my bank statement shows two deductions. This is unacceptable!
I apologize for the inconvenience, Fiona. Let me check your account details and see what went wrong. Could you please share the order number with me?
The order number is 56789. I need this resolved immediately.

Thank you for the information, Fiona. I see the duplicate charge on your account. I will process a refund for the extra charge immediately. You should see the refund in your account within 3-5 business days.
3-5 business days? That's too long. Why can't it be done now?
I understand your frustration, Fiona. Unfortunately, the banking process takes a few days to complete the transaction. Rest assured, the refund is being processed on our end.
This is just ridiculous. I expected better from Nestlé.
I apologize for the inconvenience, Fiona. We value your feedback and will work to improve our services. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, just make sure the refund is processed as soon as possible.
Absolutely, Fiona. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Have a great day.
